sentences.sentence: a flat on the first floor
sentences.translation: 二楼的一套公寓

sentences.sentence: My watch still hangs together dropping from the second floor.
sentences.translation: 我的手表从三楼掉到了楼下，却依然完整无缺。

sentences.sentence: I sprint through beetle mania into the longhallway that bisects the second floor, down the west staircase to the first floor, grateful to be in the pre-motion-detector era.
sentences.translation: 我一路快跑冲过狂热的甲虫，经过一条长廊通向二楼，我在往西面的楼梯下去，来到一楼，我感到心情愉快，好像处在早期动作侦探时代一样。

sentences.sentence: But all four of them were huddled around a second floor window, which meant they could be saved.
sentences.translation: 但是这四个孩子都挤在二楼一扇窗户的周围，这意味着他们有救。

sentences.sentence: We stood outside the teacher's office, eager to know the result of the examination.
sentences.translation: 我们站在老师办公室外面，期待着考试的结果。

sentences.sentence: Entering a teacher's office or any office with a closed door without knocking first is not acceptable.
sentences.translation: 事先不敲门而进入老师办公室或者其他关着门的办公室，也是不允许的。

sentences.sentence: Would you like to take these flowers to the teacher's office?
sentences.translation: 请你把这些花带到老师的办公室去好吗？

phrases.translation: 公共图书馆；公立图书馆
图书馆学；图书馆科学硕士
图书馆服务；程序库服务

sentences.sentence: a public library
sentences.translation: 公共图书馆

sentences.sentence: a library book
sentences.translation: 图书馆的书

sentences.sentence: children shouting and running in the playground
sentences.translation: 在操场上叫嚷奔跑的孩子们

sentences.sentence: Another classroom is computer room,where we have our computer lessons.
sentences.translation: 我们还有了计算机房，我们在那里上计算机课。

sentences.sentence: There are not only physics, chemistry and biology labs but also a language lab and a computer room.
sentences.translation: 有物理、化学和生物实验室，还有一个语音教室和一个计算机房。

sentences.sentence: We were in the computer room. Suddenly we heard bangs and then our teacher ran out, looked around and just closed the door.
sentences.translation: 我们当时在计算机房，突然之间我们听到了枪声然后老师就跑了出去，老师环顾了周围以后就把门关了起来。

sentences.sentence: Mike: Is that the art room?
sentences.translation: 迈克：这是美术教室吗?。

sentences.sentence: Where is the art room?
sentences.translation: 美术教室在哪里？

sentences.sentence: We also have music room and art rooms in the building.
sentences.translation: 我们还有音乐教室和美术教室哦。

sentences.sentence: We played all sorts of games. In the music room we sang our first songs.
sentences.translation: 我们玩转了各式的游戏，在音乐教室里唱起了第一首歌，还第一次感触了文学的魅力。

sentences.sentence: There was a little girl sitting next to him.
sentences.translation: 有个小女孩坐在他旁边。

phrases.translation: 做作业，做功课；做家庭作业

sentences.sentence: For homework, finish the exercise on page 14.
sentences.translation: 家庭作业是完成第14页的练习。

sentences.sentence: She can't be more than forty.
sentences.translation: 她不可能超过四十岁。

sentences.sentence: This was forty years ago.
sentences.translation: 这是四十年前的事了。

sentences.sentence: She was somewhat inclined to fat after forty.
sentences.translation: 四十岁以后她有点发胖了。

sentences.translation: 我们可以用几种不同的方法处理这个问题。

sentences.sentence: There’s no way of knowing if the treatment will work.
sentences.translation: 没有办法知道这种治疗方法是否有效。

sentences.sentence: We had bacon and eggs for breakfast .
sentences.translation: 我们早餐吃了熏肉鸡蛋。

sentences.sentence: I never eat breakfast .
sentences.translation: 我从来不吃早饭。

sentences.sentence: After a hearty breakfast (=  large breakfast  ) , we set out for a hike.
sentences.translation: 我们吃了一顿丰盛的早餐，然后出发去远足了。

sentences.sentence: a light breakfast
sentences.translation: 简单的早餐

sentences.sentence: a working breakfast
sentences.translation: 工作早餐

sentences.sentence: It springs from the idea of a notebook full of doodles, like that of your typical teenager during English class.
sentences.translation: 这灵感来源于在笔记本上的涂鸦乱画，就像你十几岁时在英文课上所作的那样。

sentences.sentence: One summer, Gates contracted to write a class scheduling program for his high school. He made sure to "preload" himself into an English class with a dozen girls and no other boys.
sentences.translation: 盖茨在某个暑假承接了为所就读中学编写班级安排的程序，结果，在他所上的那个英语班里面，女生成群，而盖茨却是唯一的一个男童鞋。

sentences.sentence: In my own experience, learning French at high school taught me so much more about grammar than English class ever did.
sentences.translation: 根据我自己的经历，我在高中学法语当中学到的语法知识比在英语课上学到的多的多。

phrases.translation: [美俚]疯狂的；神志不清的；过时的；懒散的
很随便的午饭；口味清淡的午餐

sentences.sentence: What’s for lunch?
sentences.translation: 午饭吃什么？

sentences.sentence: Here, prisoners and their instructor get down during a music class.
sentences.translation: 这儿服刑人员和他们的导师正在一起上音乐课。

sentences.sentence: I walk with Helen. Laura hugs me apologetically and runs off to her music class at the other end ofthe building.
sentences.translation: 我和海伦一起走，罗拉带歉意的拥抱了我一下就跑去另一幢楼去上音乐课了。

sentences.sentence: Nothing says rehabilitation like rhythm. Here, prisoners and their instructor get down during a music class.
sentences.translation: 没有人说，罪犯的改过自新后象音乐节奏。这儿服刑人员和他们的导师正在一起上音乐课。

sentences.sentence: There are only 7 girls in our PE class, so the class is mostly boys.
sentences.translation: 在我们体育班仅有7个女孩，因此这个班大多数是男生。

sentences.sentence: eg. There are only 7 girls in our PE class , so the class is mostly boys.
sentences.translation: 在我们体育班仅有7个女孩，因此这个班大多数是男生。

sentences.sentence: It made her, an ambitious girl, feel very depressed and fear taking PE class.
sentences.translation: 这让好胜心极强的她感到非常沮丧，甚至害怕上体育课。

phrases.translation: 用餐；吃晚餐；正在用餐，正在吃饭

sentences.sentence: What time do you usually have dinner?
sentences.translation: 你通常什么时候吃饭？

sentences.sentence: We’re having fish for dinner tonight.
sentences.translation: 我们今天晚饭吃鱼。

sentences.sentence: What’s for dinner?
sentences.translation: 晚饭吃什么？

sentences.sentence: I got up and walked over to where he was.
sentences.translation: 我站起来，走到他那里。

sentences.sentence: “Why would you ever go to school so far from home?” my friends would ask.
sentences.translation: 我在那边的朋友们会问我：“为什么你回去离家那么远的地方上学？

sentences.sentence: The boy refuses to go to school on [under] the pretext of illness [an ailment, sickness].
sentences.translation: 这孩子装病不去上学。

sentences.sentence: In the morning, only one gate is open, through which parents head off to work and children go to school.
sentences.translation: 每天早晨，只有一扇大门会打开，从这扇门出去父母们去上班，小孩们去上学。

sentences.sentence: I've got to go home and zonk out.
sentences.translation: 我只好回家睡大觉了。

sentences.sentence: He whispers to her: Let me go home with you.
sentences.translation: 他向她喃喃低语：让我跟你一起回家吧。

sentences.sentence: Let them go home!
sentences.translation: 让他们回家去！

sentences.sentence: They wash their faces.They go to bed!
sentences.translation: 他们洗他们的脸.他们上床睡觉！

sentences.sentence: Don't put off till tomorrow what...you put on to go to bed.
sentences.translation: 别拖到明天你上床睡觉穿的。 别拖延到明天你今天能做的。

sentences.sentence: He did not go to bed until midnight.
sentences.translation: (误)他没有上床睡觉，直到半夜。

phrases.translation: 到处，遍及；浑身；全部结束
复习，重温；仔细检查；转变；润色
adv. 一再地；反复不断地
招待某人在家吃饭 (或饮酒等)

煎半熟蛋；煎两面；结束容易
至今，直到现在，迄今为止
又怎么了（表示感到厌烦）；现在该怎么办
[表示警告或引起注意等]看，瞧
勿失良机，机不可失；把握现在
立即应用；马上申请；在线申请

sentences.sentence: She's a widow now.
sentences.translation: 她现在是一个寡妇。

sentences.sentence: But we are now a much more fragmented society.
sentences.translation: 但是我们现在是一个更加四分五裂的社会。

sentences.sentence: It's already 9 o'clock.
sentences.translation: 已经9点钟了。

sentences.sentence: The meeting is at 10 o'clock.
sentences.translation: 开会时间是10点钟。

sentences.sentence: She’d always loved animals since she was a little kid.
sentences.translation: 她从小就喜爱动物。

sentences.sentence: He’s married with three kids.
sentences.translation: 他已婚，有三个孩子。

sentences.sentence: A neighbor volunteered to keep an eye on the kids (= their children or the children they are responsible for ).
sentences.translation: 一位邻居主动来照看这些小孩。

sentences.sentence: There were thirty students present,reckoning without the girlstudents.
sentences.translation: 不算女生，有三十个学生出席。

sentences.sentence: His words refreshed my memory that he remained a bachelor at the age of thirty.
sentences.translation: 他的话使我回想起他三十岁时还是个光棍。

sentences.sentence: He counted to thirty for her in Spanish and then told her he could count to one million in English.
sentences.translation: 我儿子为她表演了用西班牙语查数，一直到三十，然后告诉她，他可以用英语一直查到一百万。

sentences.sentence: ...if you're not a traditionalist and you want to hurry up the process.
sentences.translation: …如果你不是传统主义者而是想加快这一进程。

phrases.translation: 被忽视，被冷落， 孤零零地未介入

sentences.sentence: She splashed her face with cold water.
sentences.translation: 她往脸上泼冷水。

sentences.sentence: a blast of cold air
sentences.translation: 一股冷空气

sentences.sentence: We slept on the cold ground.
sentences.translation: 我们睡在冰冷的地上。

sentences.sentence: The house felt cold and empty.
sentences.translation: 屋子里感觉很冷，空荡荡的。

phrases.translation: 保持冷静；保持凉爽；镇定自若

sentences.sentence: She swam out into the cool water.
sentences.translation: 她往外游向清凉的水里。

sentences.sentence: The evening air was cool.
sentences.translation: 夜晚的空气很凉爽。

sentences.sentence: Relax in the sun with a cool drink.
sentences.translation: 在阳光下喝杯清凉饮料放松一下。

sentences.sentence: the cooler weather of September
sentences.translation: 九月较凉爽的天气

sentences.sentence: I hope we get some warm weather soon.

sentences.sentence: I’ve put your dinner in the oven to keep it warm.

sentences.sentence: I hope it’s sunny tomorrow.

sentences.sentence: It’s too windy for a picnic.

sentences.sentence: a windy hillside

sentences.sentence: a cloudy night with some light rain

sentences.sentence: Tomorrow, it will be cloudy and cool.

sentences.translation: 1月里大雪纷飞的一天

sentences.sentence: I hate rainy weather .

sentences.sentence: What’s the weather like today?

sentences.sentence: We embarked at Liverpool for New York.
sentences.translation: 我们在利物浦上船去纽约。

sentences.sentence: He hit his car that he lost in New York.
sentences.translation: 他无意中发现了他在纽约丢失的汽车。

sentences.sentence: The railroad connects two cities, namely, New York and Chicago.
sentences.translation: 这条铁路连接两个城市，即纽约与芝加哥。

sentences.translation: 把烘箱预热至425度。

sentences.sentence: Tuberculosis is still common in some parts of the world .
sentences.translation: 结核病在世界上某些地区仍很常见。

sentences.sentence: At that time China was the most powerful country in the world .
sentences.translation: 当时中国是世界上最强大的国家。

sentences.sentence: The Taj Mahal attracts visitors from around the world .
sentences.translation: 泰姬陵吸引了来自世界各地的游客。

sentences.sentence: Students from all over the world come to study at Oxford.
sentences.translation: 世界各地的学生到牛津大学来求学。

sentences.sentence: Children are the same the world over .
sentences.translation: 全世界的孩子都一样。

sentences.sentence: The book has been published throughout the world .
sentences.translation: 这本书已在世界各地出版。

sentences.sentence: There is nothing quite like it anywhere in the world .
sentences.translation: 世界上任何地方都找不出和它类似的东西。

sentences.sentence: Europe’s relationship with the rest of the world
sentences.translation: 欧洲和世界上其他地区的关系

sentences.sentence: I decided to take a year off to travel the world .
sentences.translation: 我决定休息一年去周游世界。

sentences.sentence: a crime that shocked the world
sentences.translation: 震惊全世界的罪行

phrases.translation: 伦敦俱乐部（核燃料供应国集团）
伦敦塔（位于英国伦敦泰晤士北岸的古堡，古代曾先后作为皇宫及监狱，现为兵械库和博物馆）

sentences.sentence: I trained to London.
sentences.translation: 我乘火车到伦敦。

sentences.sentence: You have to hurdle to London and get the intelligence back.
sentences.translation: 你得克服困难到达伦敦把那份情报取回来。

sentences.sentence: He hopped to and fro between London and Paris for the business.
sentences.translation: 为了这笔生意他曾不停地往返于伦敦和巴黎。

sentences.sentence: Must go... to Moscow!
sentences.translation: 一定要去莫斯科！

sentences.sentence: Many of them are coming to Moscow from quite far away for an opportunity to have this kind of educational experience.
sentences.translation: 为了这样一个有教育意义的体验，他们中的很多人都是从很远的地方赶到莫斯科来的。

sentences.sentence: I come from Singapore.
sentences.translation: 我来自新加坡。

sentences.sentence: But not in Singapore.
sentences.translation: 但是在新加坡就不同了。

sentences.sentence: After staying a few days in Shanghai, he moved on to Singapore.
sentences.translation: 在上海逗留了几天之后，他又启程去新加坡。

sentences.sentence: My brother is living in Sydney.
sentences.translation: 我兄弟居住于悉尼。

sentences.sentence: It is designed on the model of the Sydney Opera House.
sentences.translation: 它是仿效悉尼歌剧院设计的。

sentences.sentence: My brother has just left Sydney for a tour of the world.
sentences.translation: 我哥哥刚离开悉尼去周游世界。

sentences.translation: 公园里，人们或在遛狗，或在放风筝。

sentences.sentence: He was the only man she had ever loved.
sentences.translation: 他是她唯一爱过的男人。

sentences.translation: 第二，放一些西红柿在面包上粘贴。

sentences.translation: 整条大麻哈鱼被端上了桌，并用欧芹、西红柿片和黄瓜片作为花色配菜。

sentences.sentence: Marie stood at the sink, peeling potatoes (= cutting off the skin ) .
sentences.translation: 玛丽站在洗涤槽边削土豆皮。

sentences.sentence: You can save up to $23 per plant by building an edible garden with big ticket vegetables like tomatoes, cucumbers, and green beans.
sentences.translation: 通过建造一个农田你在每颗植物可以省到23美元，你可以种一些高价蔬菜像西红柿，黄瓜，和四季豆。

sentences.sentence: The Gherkin, found in the Square mile, is cunningly crafted out of two types of melon and embedded with green beans to highlight its renowned spiralling glass frames.
sentences.translation: 位于伦敦金融城的“炮弹大厦”由两种瓜类巧妙建成，并饰以青豆，以突出这座玻璃建筑的著名螺旋式结构特点。

sentences.sentence: Plants crowd my space. I am surrounded by large banana leaves -- huge splashes of heartwarming yellow-green color -- and stringy vines of green beans entwining every vertical surface.
sentences.translation: 小屋内长满了植物，我的周围，是大片大片暖人心房的黄绿色芭蕉叶以及纤细而紧贴四周墙壁的四季豆苗。

phrases.translation: 软硬兼施的；胡萝卜棍棒并用的

sentences.sentence: grated carrots
sentences.translation: 磨碎的胡萝卜

sentences.sentence: carrot juice
sentences.translation: 胡萝卜汁

phrases.translation: 黑马（出人意外获胜的赛马或参赛人）；（美）[政]“黑马”候选人（常因各方妥协而意外获得提名或当选）
n. 白马；怀特霍斯（加拿大育空地区首府）；白马像（新石器时代、青铜时代或铁器时代雕刻在英国伯克郡等白垩山冈上）
[口语](消息等)第一手的，直接得来的
[希神]特洛伊木马；特洛伊木马（一种计算机病毒）
预付的工资；旧债；无益的事

sentences.sentence: a horse and cart
sentences.translation: 一辆马车

sentences.sentence: Lee had never ridden a horse before.
sentences.translation: 李以前从未骑过马。

phrases.translation: [俚]不会吧！；哎呀！；我的天啊（等于holy cats）
圣牛（印度教等的）；不可修改的文稿；不可批评的人（思想或事物）

sentences.sentence: Our cow is carrying again.
sentences.translation: 我家的母牛又怀胎了。

sentences.sentence: The cow is expected to calve next week.
sentences.translation: 这头母牛预期下周生小牛。

sentences.sentence: The cow cast a calf.
sentences.translation: 这头母牛早产了。

phrases.translation: 迷途羔羊（误入歧途的人）
善人与恶人 （来自《圣经》）；好人与坏人
白羊；坏人中的好人（与black sheep相对）

sentences.sentence: Sheep were grazing on the hillside.
sentences.translation: 羊群在山坡上吃草。

sentences.sentence: a sheep farmer
sentences.translation: 养羊的农民

sentences.sentence: The chickens gathered under the hen.
sentences.translation: 小鸡聚集在母鸡翅膀下面。

sentences.sentence: The hen sits in the hencoop [henroost].
sentences.translation: 母鸡卧窝。

sentences.sentence: What Jones and her colleagues wanted to learn is whether a happy hen in fact produces a better product.
sentences.translation: 琼斯和她的同事们希望弄明白，是否一只幸福的母鸡确实产出更好的产品。

sentences.sentence: A committee has been formed. These people can make decisions in ten minutes which would take us months.
sentences.translation: 委员会已经成立。这些人能在10分钟内做出决定，换作我们则要花几个月。

sentences.sentence: furry little animals
sentences.translation: 毛茸茸的小动物

sentences.sentence: The cosmetics have not been tested on animals.
sentences.translation: 这些化妆品没有进行过动物试验。

sentences.sentence: Beth is an animal lover (=  someone who likes animals  ) .
sentences.translation: 贝丝是个喜欢动物的人。

sentences.sentence: Witnesses said that two people were killed, but those accounts could not be confirmed.
sentences.translation: 目击者说两人遇害，但那些说法都没法得到证实。

phrases.translation: 园林设计；庭园设计；园艺设计
[圣经]伊甸园；清白无罪（的状况）
n. 游园会；露天招待会

sentences.sentence: He’s outside in the garden.
sentences.translation: 他在外面花园里。

sentences.sentence: Grace brought us some flowers from her garden.
sentences.translation: 格雷丝给我们送来一些她花园里的花。

phrases.translation: 在农场；在农场里，在农场上
畜牧场；禽畜饲养场；牧场

sentences.sentence: a 300-hectare farm
sentences.translation: 一座300公顷的农场

sentences.sentence: farm workers
sentences.translation: 农场工人

sentences.sentence: farm animals
sentences.translation: 农场牲畜

sentences.sentence: Joe had worked on the farm all his life.
sentences.translation: 乔在农场干了一辈子。

phrases.translation: 老色鬼；[俚]讨厌的老家伙
北美野山羊；野生白山羊

sentences.sentence: The tiger sprang on the goat.
sentences.translation: 老虎向山羊扑去。

sentences.sentence: They staked the goat in the back yard.
sentences.translation: 他们把山羊拴在后院的木桩上。

sentences.sentence: A whole goat is sputtering over the fire.
sentences.translation: 一整只被烤的山羊在火上劈啪作响。

phrases.translation: 健康首选；吃得营养；吃的好；胃口好
上馆子吃饭；锈坏；使腐烂
丢脸；被迫收回自己说的话
即食食品；速煮食品；方便食品
侵蚀；痛快地吃，尽情地吃

sentences.sentence: Felix chatted cheerfully as he ate.
sentences.translation: 费利克斯一边吃一边兴奋地聊天。

sentences.sentence: A small girl was eating an ice cream.
sentences.translation: 一个小女孩在吃冰激凌。

sentences.sentence: We had plenty to eat and drink.
sentences.translation: 我们有很多吃的喝的。

sentences.sentence: It’s important to eat healthily when you are pregnant.
sentences.translation: 怀孕的时候吃得健康很重要。

sentences.sentence: I exercise and eat right and get plenty of sleep.
sentences.translation: 我做运动，饮食得当，睡眠充足。

sentences.sentence: Would you like something to eat?
sentences.translation: 想吃点什么吗？

sentences.sentence: She can eat like a horse and never put on weight.
sentences.translation: 她可以吃得很多，但体重从来不会增加。

sentences.sentence: We stopped at McDonalds to get a bite to eat.
sentences.translation: 我们在麦当劳停下来吃点东西。

sentences.sentence: Good eating habits are the best way of preventing infection.
sentences.translation: 良好的饮食习惯是预防感染的最佳方法。

sentences.sentence: ‘More cake?’ ‘No thanks, I couldn’t eat another thing.’
sentences.translation: “再来点蛋糕？” “不要了，谢谢。 我再也吃不下了。”

sentences.sentence: No chicken for me. I don’t eat meat (= I never eat meat ).
sentences.translation: 我不要鸡肉，我不吃肉的。

sentences.sentence: Does Rob eat fish?
sentences.translation: 罗布吃鱼吗？

phrases.translation: 挂衣服的架子；衣架（等于coat hanger）

sentences.sentence: What sort of clothes was he wearing?
sentences.translation: 他穿着什么样的衣服？

sentences.sentence: I showered and put on clean clothes.
sentences.translation: 我淋浴后穿上干净的衣服。

sentences.sentence: He was still in his work clothes.
sentences.translation: 他仍然穿着工作服。

sentences.sentence: a clothes shop
sentences.translation: 服装店

sentences.sentence: She was wearing dark blue pants and a white sweater.
sentences.translation: 她穿着深蓝色长裤和白色毛衣。

phrases.translation: 毕恭毕敬地；温顺地；恳求地
n. （红衣主教的）主教红帽；红衣主教
好人（美国西部片中好人戴白帽子，坏人戴黑帽子）；白帽黑客（合法的黑客，工作时寻找、测试和修补威胁计算机的漏洞）；白色帽子
黑帽子；黑帽式的黑客；坏人
n. 牛仔帽；宽边高呢帽
帽子戏法（指连入三球），[板球]连中三柱（使对方三击球手退场）
让我们向…表示敬意(或钦佩等)
三角帽；船位误差三角形

sentences.sentence: Maria was wearing a beautiful new hat.
sentences.translation: 玛丽亚戴着一顶漂亮的新帽子。

phrases.translation: v. 打扮，装饰；穿上盛装
n. 化装舞会所穿着的服装
叱责；着朴素的服装；梳刷
酒会礼服；（正式场合穿的）短裙
女装人体模型；服装人体模型；服装模型（陈列服装的人体模型）

sentences.sentence: Sheila wore a long red dress.
sentences.translation: 希拉穿了一条红色的连衣长裙。

sentences.sentence: a summer dress
sentences.translation: 夏天穿的连衣裙

sentences.sentence: She wore a white blouse and a plain black skirt.
sentences.translation: 她穿着白衬衣和纯黑的裙子。

sentences.sentence: Billy! Put your coat on , it’s cold outside!
sentences.translation: 比利！穿上外套，外面很冷！

sentences.sentence: The kids took off their coats and threw them on the floor.
sentences.translation: 孩子们脱下外套扔在地板上。

sentences.sentence: I need a new winter coat .
sentences.translation: 我需要一件新的冬衣。

sentences.sentence: The lab assistants wear long white coats.
sentences.translation: 实验室助手穿着白色的长外套。

sentences.sentence: The sweater is moth-eaten.
sentences.translation: 毛衣让蛀虫咬坏了。

sentences.sentence: Wearing a sweater will keep us warm.
sentences.translation: 毛衣穿了能保暖。

phrases.translation: vt. 阻止…飞行；关闭…不许飞机起落

sentences.sentence: a pair of socks
sentences.translation: 一双短袜

sentences.sentence: white ankle socks
sentences.translation: 白色的齐踝短袜

phrases.translation: adj. 短周期的；短过期的
短篇小说（指一万字以内的小说）
短使用期限；短寿命；不耐久的

sentences.sentence: I pointed to my shorts and trotted on.
sentences.translation: 于是我指了指我的短裤，继续向前跑去。

sentences.sentence: This shop sells the latest fashion of shirts and shorts.
sentences.translation: 这个店在卖最新流行的衬衫和短裤。

sentences.sentence: Ifyou run where there are a lot of other runners, try this game: Pick outa specific article of clothing, such as black running shorts, to lookfor during your run.
sentences.translation: 如果你跑步的地方有很多跑步者，试试这个游戏：挑选一件特别的衣服，比如黑色运动短裤，然后在跑步的过程中找到它。

phrases.translation: 羽绒服；鸭绒衣；羽绒夹克
晚礼服；无尾礼服；小礼服；礼服夹克（等于tuxedo）
猎装；便装上衣；（男子在非正式场合穿的）粗花呢西装外套

sentences.sentence: He unzipped his jacket.
sentences.translation: 他拉开夹克衫的拉链。

sentences.sentence: The bitter wind cut through his jacket.
sentences.translation: 刺骨的冷风吹透了他的夹克衫。

sentences.sentence: When I grew out of my jacket,I gave it to my little brother.
sentences.translation: 我长得穿不下我的夹克衫了，便把它给我弟弟穿。

phrases.translation: [口]妄自尊大的人；自命不凡的人；道貌岸然的人
法兰绒衬衫；法兰绒上衣
n. T恤；短袖圆领运动衫（等于T-shirt）

sentences.sentence: I have to wear a shirt and tie to work.
sentences.translation: 我上班要穿衬衫打领带。

sentences.sentence: a check shirt
sentences.translation: 格子衬衫

sentences.sentence: This is our room, and yours is just across the hall.
sentences.translation: 这是我们的房间，你们的在走廊那边。

sentences.sentence: A lot of people have money problems, but yours are more serious than most people’s.
sentences.translation: 许多人有财务问题，不过你的问题比大多数人的要严重。

sentences.sentence: A cash prize of £10,000 or a new car – the choice is yours.
sentences.translation: 一万英镑的奖金或一辆新车——随你选择。

sentences.sentence: Whose is this?
sentences.translation: 这是谁的？

sentences.sentence: Whose keys are those?
sentences.translation: 那些钥匙是谁的？

phrases.translation: 酸性矿水排水；排泄酸性矿水

sentences.sentence: It was Glen’s idea, not mine.
sentences.translation: 这是格伦的主意，不是我的。

sentences.sentence: ‘Is that your car?’ ‘No, mine is parked over the road.’
sentences.translation: “那是你的车吗？”“不是，我的车停在路对面。”

sentences.sentence: You’ve got good legs – mine are too thin.
sentences.translation: 你的腿很美——我的腿太细了。

sentences.sentence: His English is better than mine.
sentences.translation: 他英语比我好。

phrases.translation: 一包；（野兽等的）一群；一盒
塞进；挤进；塞满了东西；某地方挤满了人
冰袋；大片浮冰；[医]冰裹法
n. （海上相互重叠的）浮冰块，积冰
罩板包装（硬底上有凸起透明罩的物品包装）
不可靠的人，有敛癖的人
请稍候，请稍等；请您稍候；正在暖机等待结束再开始使用

sentences.sentence: Hurry up! Everyone’s waiting.
sentences.translation: 快点！大家在等着呢。

sentences.sentence: Would you mind waiting outside?
sentences.translation: 你在外面等好吗？

sentences.sentence: We’ve been waiting ages.
sentences.translation: 我们已经等了很长时间了。

phrases.translation: 外柔内刚；表面温和的东西
手套箱；手套式操作箱（真空设备用）
(向…)应战；接受(…的)挑战[亦作 gantlet]
n. （汽车仪表板上的）贮物箱
认真地;毫不留情地[亦作 without gloves]

sentences.sentence: a pair of gloves
sentences.translation: 一副手套

sentences.sentence: boxing gloves
sentences.translation: 拳击手套

sentences.sentence: Hey, your scarf is slipping off.
sentences.translation: 喂， 你的围巾快掉了。

sentences.sentence: The scarf flapped her face.
sentences.translation: 围巾轻拂着她的脸。

sentences.sentence: She muffled her throat with a scarf.
sentences.translation: 她用围巾围住脖子。

phrases.translation: n. （美）遮阳伞（海滨或花园用的）

sentences.sentence: It started to rain, so Tricia stopped to put up her umbrella.
sentences.translation: 开始下雨了，所以特里西娅停下来撑起雨伞。

sentences.sentence: I spent the day on the beach, lying under a beach umbrella, reading.
sentences.translation: 那天我就在海滩上度过，躺在海滩遮阳伞下面看书。

sentences.sentence: What do you think of my new sunglasses?
sentences.translation: 你觉得我的新太阳镜怎么样？

sentences.sentence: What color should I choose for my sunglasses?
sentences.translation: 我该挑一副什么颜色的太阳镜呢？

sentences.sentence: I can’t see her eyes, but I can see her eyebrows above the sunglasses.
sentences.translation: 我看不到她的眼睛，但是能看到她露在太阳镜上面的眉毛。

phrases.translation: 漂亮男孩；脂粉气十足的男人；矫揉造作的男子
一大笔钱；大数目之金钱
[美国俚语]容易的；便当的；合算的

sentences.sentence: the most expensive restaurant in town
sentences.translation: 城里最贵的餐馆

sentences.sentence: Petrol is becoming more and more expensive.
sentences.translation: 汽油越来越贵了。

sentences.sentence: Photography is an expensive hobby.
sentences.translation: 摄影是一项很花钱的业余爱好。

sentences.sentence: For low-income families, children’s safety equipment can be prohibitively expensive (= so expensive that most people cannot afford it ).
sentences.translation: 对于低收入家庭来说，儿童的安全设备贵得让人望而却步。

sentences.sentence: Employing the wrong builder can be a horribly expensive mistake.
sentences.translation: 用错建筑工人有时会是代价高昂的错误。

sentences.sentence: Her husband had expensive tastes (= liked expensive things ).
sentences.translation: 她丈夫喜欢的东西都很贵。

phrases.translation: [口]觉得身体不舒服；感到惭愧
低利借款；来得容易的非正当收入；在钱上好商量的人

sentences.sentence: cheap rail fares
sentences.translation: 便宜的火车票

sentences.sentence: the cheapest TV on the market
sentences.translation: 市场上最便宜的电视机

sentences.sentence: Property is cheaper in Spain than here.
sentences.translation: 西班牙的房地产比这里便宜。

sentences.sentence: a cheap shop (= one that sells goods cheaply )
sentences.translation: 廉价商店

sentences.sentence: The equipment is relatively cheap and simple to use.
sentences.translation: 这种设备相对比较便宜，而且操作简单。

sentences.sentence: This coat was dirt cheap (= very cheap – an informal expression 非正式用语 ) .
sentences.translation: 这件外套超便宜。

phrases.translation: 很高兴认识你；很高兴见到你

sentences.sentence: They’ve got a very nice house.
sentences.translation: 他们的房子真漂亮。

sentences.sentence: Did you have a nice time?
sentences.translation: 你们玩得开心吗？

sentences.sentence: It’s such a nice day (= good weather ), why not go for a swim?
sentences.translation: 天气真好，为什么不去游泳呢？

sentences.sentence: What a nice surprise!
sentences.translation: 真是个惊喜！

sentences.sentence: One of the nice things about Christmas is having all the family together.
sentences.translation: 圣诞节的一个好处是全家可以聚首一堂。

sentences.sentence: Try on clothing and shoes to make sure they fit.
sentences.translation: 衣服和鞋要试穿以确保它们合适。

phrases.translation: 粒度分布；粒径分布；大小分布；径谱
孔径；孔隙大小；气孔尺寸
尺寸效应；规模效果；晶粒尺寸效应
人口规模；人口数量；群体大小

sentences.sentence: He’s a small boy, about John’s size.
sentences.translation: 他是个小男孩，个子和约翰差不多。

sentences.sentence: Jensens’ house is about the same size as ours.
sentences.translation: 詹森的房子和我们的差不多大。

sentences.sentence: He’s quite a big dog, but he’s still not full size yet.
sentences.translation: 这条狗体型很大，但还没有长足。

sentences.sentence: Well, she won, of course.
sentences.translation: 噢，当然是她赢啦。

sentences.sentence: You should of course keep copies of all your correspondence.
sentences.translation: 你当然应该保留所有信函的复印件。

sentences.sentence: Of course there will be some difficult times ahead.
sentences.translation: 今后当然会有遇到困难的时候。

sentences.sentence: Do you think the music’s too loud?
sentences.translation: 你觉得音乐太响了吗？

sentences.sentence: You’ve put too much salt in the soup.
sentences.translation: 你往汤里放盐太多。

sentences.sentence: There are too many cars on the road.
sentences.translation: 路上车辆太多。

phrases.translation: 就在那时，正当那时；正在那时
还是；完全一样；照旧（等于all the same）

sentences.sentence: A good strong cup of coffee is just what I need right now.
sentences.translation: 我现在正需要喝一杯浓浓的咖啡。

sentences.sentence: The house was large and roomy; just right for us.
sentences.translation: 那幢房子大而宽敞，正合我们的需要。

sentences.sentence: She looks just like her mother.
sentences.translation: 她看上去就像她妈妈。

sentences.sentence: Just what do you think you’re trying to do?
sentences.translation: 你究竟想干什么？

sentences.sentence: A nice hot bath – just the thing(= exactly the right thing ) to relax sore muscles.
sentences.translation: 洗个舒服的热水澡，那正是缓解肌肉酸痛的好方法。

sentences.sentence: Work out how much all these things will cost.
sentences.translation: 算计算计买这么多东西要多少钱。

sentences.sentence: It is not how much you read but what you read that counts.
sentences.translation: 问题不在于你读了多少书，而在于你读了哪些有价值的书。

sentences.sentence: I got an eighty something.
sentences.translation: 我考了八十几分.

sentences.sentence: Azariah the priest with eighty other courageous priests of the Lord followed him in.
sentences.translation: 祭司亚撒利雅率领耶和华勇敢的祭司八十人，跟随他进去。

sentences.sentence: It cost three dollars.
sentences.translation: 它要三美元。

sentences.sentence: a ten-dollar bill
sentences.translation: 一张十元钞票

sentences.sentence: You can pay in dollars or euros at the airport.
sentences.translation: 在机场你可以使用美元或欧元。

phrases.translation: 宅前旧货出售；在私家车库进行的家中旧货出售

sentences.sentence: Harvey gets a $50 commission every time he makes a sale (= sells something as part of his job ) .
sentences.translation: 哈维每做成一笔生意可得到50美元的佣金。

sentences.sentence: Car salesmen will often bring down the price rather than lose a sale (= fail to sell something ) .
sentences.translation: 汽车推销员常常宁愿降价也不愿失去一笔生意。

sentences.sentence: arms sales to Iran
sentences.translation: 对伊朗的军火销售

phrases.translation: 更多信息；详细信息；更多资料
需要更多信息；取得进一步资讯

sentences.sentence: More and more people are surviving heart attacks.
sentences.translation: 越来越多的人在心脏病发作后存活下来。

sentences.sentence: He spent more time perfecting his dance moves instead of gym work.
sentences.translation: 他用更多的时间来完善他的舞蹈动作而不是健身。

sentences.sentence: Please help us.
sentences.translation: 请帮助我们。

sentences.sentence: He arranged for us all to have a drink.
sentences.translation: 他安排我们大家一起喝一杯。

sentences.sentence: She’s invited us both.
sentences.translation: 我们俩她都请了。

sentences.sentence: My mother is coming to stay with us.
sentences.translation: 我妈要来和我们同住。

sentences.sentence: Send us a donation now.
sentences.translation: 现在就给我们捐款吧。
